dataset_fields.label: Creator
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource. Examples of a Creator include a person, an organization, or a service.

dataset_fields.label: Contributor
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Type
dataset_fields.help_text: The nature or genre of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Identifier
dataset_fields.help_text: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

dataset_fields.label: Source
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

dataset_fields.label: Rights
dataset_fields.help_text: Information about rights held in and over the resource. Typically, rights information includes a statement about various property rights associated with the resource, including intellectual property rights.

dataset_fields.label: Alternative Title
dataset_fields.help_text: The distinction between titles and alternative titles is application-specific.

dataset_fields.label: Abstract
dataset_fields.help_text: A summary (of the content) of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Access Rights
dataset_fields.help_text: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

dataset_fields.label: Accrual Method
dataset_fields.help_text: The method by which items are added to a collection.

dataset_fields.label: Accrual Periodicity
dataset_fields.help_text: The frequency with which items are added to a collection.

dataset_fields.label: Accrual Policy
dataset_fields.help_text: The policy governing the addition of items to a collection. The Accrual Policy for a library subject collection for which new books and journals are bought - Active. The Accrual Policy for a special collection to which items are added only of they are donated or deposited by an external agent - Passive.

dataset_fields.label: Audience
dataset_fields.help_text: A class of entity for whom the resource is intended or useful.

dataset_fields.label: Date Available From
dataset_fields.help_text: Date (often a range) that the resource became or will become available.

dataset_fields.label: Date Available To
dataset_fields.help_text: Date (often a range) that the resource became or will become available.

dataset_fields.label: Bibliographic Citation
dataset_fields.help_text: A bibliographic reference for the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Conforms To
dataset_fields.help_text: An established standard to which the described resource conforms.

dataset_fields.label: Audience Education Level
dataset_fields.help_text: A class of entity, defined in terms of progression through an educational or training context, for which the described resource is intended.

dataset_fields.label: Instructional Method
dataset_fields.help_text: A process, used to engender knowledge, attitudes and skills, that the described resource is designed to support.

dataset_fields.label: Date Issued
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/

dataset_fields.label: Mediator
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful. In an educational context, a mediator might be a parent, teacher, teaching assistant, or care-giver.

dataset_fields.label: Medium
dataset_fields.help_text: The material or physical carrier of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Provenance
dataset_fields.help_text: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation that are significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

dataset_fields.label: Rights Holder
dataset_fields.help_text: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Temporal Coverage
dataset_fields.help_text: Temporal characteristics of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Table Of Contents
dataset_fields.help_text: A list of subunits of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Is Version Of
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation.

dataset_fields.label: Has Version
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.

dataset_fields.label: Is Replaced By
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that supplants, displaces, or supersedes the described resource.

dataset_fields.label: Replaces
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that is supplanted, displaced, or superseded by the described resource.

dataset_fields.label: Is Required By
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that requires the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.

dataset_fields.label: Requires
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that is required by the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.

dataset_fields.label: Is Part Of
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included.

dataset_fields.label: Has Part
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that is included either physically or logically in the described resource.

dataset_fields.label: Is Referenced By
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that references, cites, or otherwise points to the described resource.

dataset_fields.label: References
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.

dataset_fields.label: Is Format Of
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that is substantially the same as the described resource, but in another format.

dataset_fields.label: Has Format
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource that is substantially the same as the pre-existing described resource, but in another format.

dataset_fields.label: Date Accepted
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of acceptance of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Date Copyrighted
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of copyright.

dataset_fields.label: Date Submitted
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of submission of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Date Valid
dataset_fields.help_text: Date of validity of a resource.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
